channel.title: Stanley Solutions Blog - Conferences
channel.description: engineering and creativity - all under one hat

item.title: I'm Presenting at LinuxFest Northwest 2024!
item.description: This is it... My first non-work-related technical presentation at a conference. It's pretty exciting! It's right in my own back yard, even! I'm presenting at LinuxFest Northwest, 2024!
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley
